title._content: Dining Room of Christian Kold School

description._content: Image Description from historic lecture booklet: "Perhaps the outstanding feature of the Folk High schools is the sociability which is developed. Dinging quarters are provided for all students and in the dining room the faculty and students always eat together. The dining room at the Christian Kold School near Odense is one of the largest. Christian Kold founded this, the second of the Folk High Schools and is ranked next to the Grundtvig as a moulder of their plans and policies. " Original Collection: Visual Instruction Department Lantern Slides Item Number: P217:set 067 032 You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more?
